stanza.line: Accuse me thus that I have scantedall
Wherein I should your great desertsrepay
Forgot upon your dearest love tocall
Whereto all bonds do tie me day byday
That I have frequent been with unknownminds
And given to time your own dear purchasedright
That I have hoisted sail to all thewinds
Which should transport me farthest from yoursight
Book both my wilfulness and errorsdown
And on just proof surmise accumulate
Bring me within the level of yourfrown
But shoot not at me in your wakened hate
Since my appeal says I did strive to prove
The constancy and virtue of your love
